thread.title: Mass. man sentenced for Vt. bank robbery
thread.title_full: Mass. man sentenced for Vt. bank robbery - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Mass. man sentenced for Vt. bank robbery
text:
BRATTLEBORO, Vt. (AP) - A man has been sentenced to 4-10 years in prison after pleading guilty to assault, robbery and grand larceny in connection with a bank robbery last year.
The Brattleboro Reformer reports 69-year-old David Abbott of Gardner, Massachusetts, pleaded guilty Monday in a plea deal with prosecutors to robbing the Brattleboro Savings & Loan in November.
Police said Abbott showed up wearing a security uniform and asked to speak to the manager about savings accounts and other banking business.
Abbott then said he was robbing the bank and had a gun with him. The manager said Abbott threatened her and her family.
He apologized in court to the people he frightened at the bank that day.
